document.full_text: the bank of england raised its inflation forecast, paving the way for a rate rise towards the end of the year despite its view that the economy was recovering more slowly than hoped.
document.title: bank of england forecasts hint at rate rise before end of year
lines_and_colors: the bank of england raised its inflation forecast, paving the way for a rate rise towards the end of the year despite its view that the economy was recovering more slowly than hoped.
